TopicTitle: KSP 2 Clouds dont look like how others look.

Articles.Content: I have just gotten KSP2, my system specs are over the recommended and I play on max settings.  When I first played though, the clouds looked pixelated not like YouTube videos of others playing it.  This picture below if from a reddit post which is pretty much what my clouds look like. Im just wondering if there are any ways to make them look better or if they will be improved in future updates. Also is this a issue on my side or is an issue with KSP.
Moved to KSP2 Gameplay Questions.
Mine look like that as well. I also exceed the specs.
I'm having the same issue, I exceed the specs as well. Its really nauseating to me and making it really hard to play :(
Hopefully at the end of early access  or some time in the future they make them better or a mod come out to fix this.
Go into the options, toggle the clouds to minimum, save, exit the options to confirm things have changed, then go and toggle them back to maximum. See if that makes a difference.

Clouds for me look even worse than that.  The Youtube streamer clouds look like Microsoft Flight Simulator 2020 clouds but without any exaggeration clouds on my computer look like Flight Simulator 1 from 1985.
